name: Sane Plates
description:
This game is a little parody based on Crazy Platez.

Credits:

Textures from Google Maps, Textures.com, my google photo library
Some models from unity asset store
sound from the game Crazy Platez

Sounds:

The mac and linux builds are untested, let me know if there's any issues!
